attributes.action: Declare Tommy Robinson a legitimate activist for free speech
attributes.background: Tommy Robinson has been denied a freedom of speech that is granted to all, provided it does not break the law.  Mr Robinson has not broken any laws on hate speech or religious hatred.  We, the people, wish for him to be exonerated in this regard and have all social media platforms restored to him.

rejection.details: The UK Government or Parliament are not responsible for restoring social media accounts. This would be a decision for the social media platforms.
